

--Work Order hours report generated by Jeff Z.
--This query is built with JDE/DB2 syntax for direct query to Samson/JDE



SELECT
wldoco
,wldcto
,wlmmcu

,wlkitl
,imdsc1
,imdsc2
,imsrp1
,'need desc' AS imsrp1d
,imprp4
,'need desc' AS imprp4d
,imsrp4
,'need desc' as imsrp4d
,wlopsq/100 AS OPSEQ
,wlopst
,wlstrx AS Operdate
,wlmcu
,wldsc1
,wluorg
,wlsoqs
,imuom1
,IFNULL(irtrt,'') AS irtrt
,ifnull(imsrp5,'') AS imsrp5
,IFNULL(irrunm*.01,0) AS RunMach
,ifnull(irrunl*.01,0) AS runlab
,ifnull(irsetl*.01,0) AS Setup


FROM f3112 wor 
	LEFT OUTER JOIN F4801 wom ON wom.WADOCO=wor.WLDOCO AND wom.WAMMCU=wor.WLMMCU
	LEFT OUTER JOIN f4101 im ON im.IMITM=wor.WLKIT
	LEFT OUTER JOIN F3003 rm ON rm.IRKIT=wor.WLKIT
							AND rm.IRMMCU=wor.WLMMCU
							AND rm.IROPSQ=wor.WLOPSQ
							AND rm.IRTRT=wor.WLTRT
WHERE wor.wlstrx>=118274 AND wor.wlstrx<=118304	
AND CHAR_LENGTH(trim(WLMCU))>=5
